item.title: Amazon's leadership principles
item.description: These are the 16 leadership principles from Amazon. Customer obsession Ownership Invent and simplify Are right, a lot Learn and be curious Hire and develop the best Insist on the highest standards Think big Bias for action Frugality Earn trust Dive deep Have backbone; disagree and commit Deliver results Strive to be earth’s best employer Success and scale bring broad responsibility Learn more about the Amazon Leadership Principles.
